articles.description: The erstwhile govt-owned carrier is said to be mulling an order for the European plane makers A350 widebodied planes. This would be its first aircraft order since 2006. It would also make it the first Indian airline to order the A350, which is fast gaining po…
articles.content:
Air India is reorganising itself under the Tata group and will look at refurbishing its fleet with new aircraft, said a senior executive at Airbus on Sunday.
